name: Chair Thrower
description:
You just lost your job at a crummy furniture store and now you need to release your pent up rage by chucking chairs everywhere but the other employees are trying to stop you. Throw chairs at the furniture store employees to avoid taking responsibility for your actions.

This is a just a small demo of the basic mechanics and ideas that I have for this game. I will continue adding more content to this project as time goes by so if you like what you see, stay tuned for more.

Enjoy!
